titleStmt.title: A confession of Christian religion
Protestation against popery by way of a confession of Christian religion collected for the benefit of private friends
titleStmt.author: I. D., fl. 1607.
Dunster, John, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A revised and enlarged edition of A protestation against popery by way of a confession of Christian religion collected for the benefit of private friends (STC 6172), which has been attributed to John Dunster. In this edition the poem at the end is lacking.
Some pages missing in number only.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
